title: #83: The Keepers: Joining the Dots
description:
The RCP team (Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti) continue their analysis arcing across Episode #2 of The Netflix show The Keepers. Jane Doe is found and interviewed with some startling revelations. 

Jim C reveals why he feels so strongly about child victims and Laura dissects coercive control, sexual coercion and child sexual exploitation. The Keepers Episode #2 and #RCP pod ends with a dramatic cliff hanger. 


#HerNameWasCathy

#HerNameWasJoyce

#HerNameISJean
